title: Pes (ec) vs Dayanand Sagar.
content:
Which would be better?
Cse in pes ec or cs spec in Dayanand Sagar?

comments.body: Cse in pes ec and it's not even close
But cutoffs of dayanand sagar is greater tho
Is it now?? When I joined pes ec cse had a greater cutoff

Yep
How's the ec campus?
I saw the rr campus nd it's huge
Lot fewer buildings but more open space
Ohh thanks!
Should I choose cse aiml in pes ec or ise in dsce or cse aiml rr(Pessat)
Man compared biryani to pulao
Choose PES over DSCE. There is no difference between the campuses so choose the cheaper mode of admission.
Ok thanks!
![gif](giphy|pRh2jqZ63EAK4P0BjH)

Asking for my friend 
My friend got 7xx in kcet should he choose pes cs or rvce cs spec
Bruh is dayanad sagar that bad?ðŸ’€
AyoðŸ˜­

I have another option that is bms iot cybersecurity 
Or Ms ramiah cs with business system 
What to choose?ðŸ˜­
Honestly, neither. PES CS is much better than these specialisations
Both are pretty comparable IMO. RV does have better placements but I don't think it's by much. Pick RVCE only if you think the difference in placements is worth skipping out on core CS.
bro whats wrong with you? cutoffs are similiar coz pes has wayyy more seats
So i should choose pes?

im in same dilemma 
i know pes ec is wayyyyy better than dsce 
the thing is i live 2 mins away from dsce and pes ec is 16kms from my place and i dont wanna go hostel
upto you, dayanand is chiller if that matters
Doesn't matter much tbh
How's the crowd at ec?
Not worth sacrificing a better college just because its convenient to travel to a worse one. There are people at PES who travel 1.5 hours one-way on a daily basis.
also pes through pessat and dsce through kcet
Need help, is dsce that bad? Pes is situated outside the blore right? The campus surrounding is better at dsce ig, does teaching really matter? Is there a really big difference in placement?
